channel.title: Vengance help
channel.description:
hey i was wondering how i could get the red skull over my head when i hit vengance... and how to get it to recoil...
- Thanks, Gh0st Jr

item.title: Vengance help
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

Red skull is client sided
And to get it to inflict (recoil) you need to add this

if (AttackingOn2.Vengeance) { player.hitDiff = hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(30); player.hitUpdateRequired = true; player.updateRequired = true; player.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; AttackingOn2.VengeanceTimer = 0; AttackingOn2.VenTimer = 0; AttackingOn2.Vengeance = false; AttackingOn2.txt4 = "Taste Vengeance!"; AttackingOn2.string4UpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic
